to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: switching to testing at install?
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

The net install is done from cd these days. I doubt floppy images are
still available, though they might be, I haven't checked.

Greg



On Sat, Jun 16, 2007 at 03:25:22AM -0800, Gaijin wrote:
>      If you're booting and installing from floppies, I was thinking that 
> they could be edited to point at testing before startup.  Sounded like 
> you might, if you're doing a net install.   Sorry I mentioned 
> it. 
> 
>          Michael
> 
>
